quagga.input.subject: Discussion tomorrow at 11:30 CST on FERC & gas
quagga.input.xto: Joe Hartsoe, Jeff Dasovich, Leslie Lawner, James D Steffes
quagga.input.body:
As discussed, I have arranged for a 30 minute meeting regarding our group's 
participation, if any, in the upcoming presentations to FERC regarding 
pipeline capacity and gas prices in CA.

Details are as follows:

This meeting will take place tomorrow, Friday the 11th at 11:30 CST in 47C1.
The call in number is: 1-888-296-1938, participant code: 143538
 
Note to Jim, Joe and Leslie:  This meeting will immediately follow the 11am 
West Gas meeting.

Thanks, 

Jennifer
5-3550
